name: ColorBlind (Michel001)
description:
This game is a Puzzle genre game. There will be a grid of different colors. The Center of the grid contains a text which indicates a color. The player have to choose that color from other grids.

Difficulty and Scoring are based on time, grid number and rotation.Player have to choose the color from the grid before the given time to avoid game over. Player will be rewarded by different score based on how fast he/she can choose the color. Grid number of every levels are different like 4,6,8 etc. Rotation of grids in circle type levels also add some difficulty for players playing this game.

Players may find this game as a very exciting game as player have to choose from different colors from the grid where he/she faces the dilemma to choose the color according to color or text.
